Minato kicks the opponent in the air, throws his [[Flying Thunder God Kunai]], teleports to them, and kicks them again, ending the combo with a Rasengan while on the ground as the opponent falls down on the attack.

[[es:Destello Rasengan Amarillo]]
[[pl:Rasengan Żółtego Błysku]]
